name: CompuCell3D
description: A flexible and extensible simulation environment for multi-cellular systems biology, including the use of cellular Potts models.

processes.name: CellGrowth
processes.description: Process describing the growth of cells over time.

processes.name: CellDivision
processes.description: Process describing the division of cells.

processes.name: ChemicalDiffusion
processes.description: Process describing the diffusion of chemicals within the tissue.

pde_boundary_conditions.description: Dirichlet boundary condition for chemical concentration
Neumann boundary condition for chemical flux

geometric_constraints.description: Periodic boundary condition for cell movement
